title: Wildboyz
author: VD
content_html: Any show that involves guys dressing up in zebra suits and wandering out into the veldt is definitely Space Bunny’s idea of good humor. “Klipspringer – the cheesepuff of the African safari.”
content_text: Any show that involves guys dressing up in zebra suits and wandering out into the veldt is definitely Space Bunny’s idea of good humor.  “Klipspringer – the cheesepuff of the African safari.”
